messages.title: Regarding NHS and Social Care
messages.content: And now it's got worse. The old thought patterns in the powers on our health serviceâ€”the intention is the same. Our government needs to be starting to make more elderly people with mobility problems and dementia get the care they need.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour is the only party pledging to give the NHS the money it needs.

issues.health: The letter expresses concerns about NHS underfunding and mismanagement, resulting in long waiting times and pressure on staff and resources.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour intends to bring trust back into social care.

housing.content: Older people with mobility problems and dementia need to get the care they need without being punished for being ill and not being able to leave their home to their children.

leaflet.personalStatement: My name is Dr Dean Eggitt and I'm a GP here in Yorkshire. I'm having to write your name here because I care immensely about our health service.

politicalExperience.achievements: Dr. Dean Eggitt has considerable experience working in the NHS and is familiar with the challenges faced by both patients and staff.

images.caption: Campaign leaflet of Dr. Dean Eggitt
